question: Neuropathy seem inevitable with being diabetic. Was very active in aerobics and since 2012 been experiencing neuropathy. Need to feel able again especially that what I'm able, is giving me the ability to strengthen my muscles!Don't want to damage anything or act without knowledge that may overwork me and possibly cause problems; especially with what I ail. With neuropathy how should one pursue exercise & are there types to consider that will maintain as well as avoid the possibility of tendon & or muscle strain/damage?
title: Diabetes neuropathy
